basics.name: Trung Dang
basics.label: Ph.D. Student
basics.summary: A Ph.D. Student with a focus in Theoretical Computer Science.

work.name: The University of Texas at Austin
work.summary: Research Focus: Theoretical Computer Science, with a focus in Algorithmic Economics, Mechanism Design, and Prophet Inequalities.

work.name: Meta
work.summary: Migrated and optimized an important internal data streaming service using modern C++.

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin

awards.title: Honorable Mention, CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Awards
awards.summary: The CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Awards program recognizes undergraduate students in North American colleges and universities who show outstanding potential in an area of computing research.

volunteer.summary: Writing algorithmic blogs and tutorials for the competitive programming community in Vietnam.
Coordinating and setting problems for some of the most prestigious Vietnamese competitive programming contests.
highlights: Head of the Problem Setting team for VNOI Cup 2023 and 2024
Problem Setter for ICPC Hue Regional 2023
Problem Setter for ICPC National South 2021

volunteer.summary: Coaching the UT Austin's ICPC team.
highlights: Lead UT to attend ICPC World Finals 2024.
